mapper.select: select id, nav_type_id, nav_name, nav_desc, nav_url, nav_logo, nav_shared, nav_tag, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, is_delete from nav_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into nav_info(nav_type_id, nav_name, nav_desc, nav_url, nav_logo, nav_shared, nav_tag, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, is_delete) values (#{navTypeId}, #{navName}, #{navDesc}, #{navUrl}, #{navLogo}, #{navShared}, #{navTag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{isDelete})

insert into nav_info(nav_type_id, nav_name, nav_desc, nav_url, nav_logo, nav_shared, nav_tag, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.navTypeId}, #{entity.navName}, #{entity.navDesc}, #{entity.navUrl}, #{entity.navLogo}, #{entity.navShared}, #{entity.navTag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateBy}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})

insert into nav_info(nav_type_id, nav_name, nav_desc, nav_url, nav_logo, nav_shared, nav_tag, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.navTypeId}, #{entity.navName}, #{entity.navDesc}, #{entity.navUrl}, #{entity.navLogo}, #{entity.navShared}, #{entity.navTag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateBy}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})
on duplicate key update nav_type_id = values(nav_type_id), nav_name = values(nav_name), nav_desc = values(nav_desc), nav_url = values(nav_url), nav_logo = values(nav_logo), nav_shared = values(nav_shared), nav_tag = values(nav_tag), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), last_update_by = values(last_update_by), last_update_time = values(last_update_time), is_delete = values(is_delete)
mapper.update:
update nav_info
nav_type_id = #{navTypeId},
nav_name = #{navName},
nav_desc = #{navDesc},
nav_url = #{navUrl},
nav_logo = #{navLogo},
nav_shared = #{navShared},
nav_tag = #{navTag},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where id = #{id}
